title: How to Box Step | Sexy Dance Moves

json.text: Victor: Hi, my name is Victor Cho
Victor: and together we are going to teach you how to
Victor: Box step. Alright, so we're going to start with your right foot stepping forward
and crossing over. Then your left leg coming back, and your right leg come back. Then your
left leg stepping over and crossing over, and it's the same thing again. Right, back,
right, back, left cross, right cross. Back, back, back, left cross, right cross. Back,
back, left cross, right cross. Cool.
Lyshanna: If I go out to a party, if I just do that I don't think I'll look cool enough.
Victor: You're right. So we're going to show you how to stylize this. Just a little bit.
Have a little bit more fun, yeah? Cool. So you want to get your arms loose, you know
what I'm saying? You want to get a little lower, get lower. You're going to start it
off, warm it up, and here we go and a bada, ha. You might want to show some variations,
leaning up and then leaning down. There we go and up, and down, and up, and down, and
up, and down and up, and down. And that's how you do the box step.
